agenda_items.name: 2017 Sept PSA's
agenda_items.title: Authorize the Director, or his or her management designee, to execute the Personal Services and Instruction Agreements and amend Attachment "A" of the agreements as needed.

agenda_items.name: 2017 Sept Fee Waivers
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the fee waiver requests outlined in Attachment "A", in accordance with the Fee Waiver policy.

agenda_items.name: 2017 Sept. AR 8-7
agenda_items.title: Receive a report from the Park Usage and Regulations Committee relative to any possible recommendation(s) related to City Manager Administrative Regulation 8-7 (Policy and Procedures for the Naming of City-owned Land, Buildings and Facilities) and refer the naming of the senior meals program at Cesar E. Chavez Park to the Housing and Neighborhoods Committee for review. (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 2017 Haute Dog Howlo'ween Event
agenda_items.title:
Approve Special Event Permit Application #18-09664 of Justin Rudd dba the Community Action Team - California, a Domestic non-profit corporation, for the operation of the Haute Dog Howl’oween Parade in Marina Vista Park with parameters determined by the Office of Special Events and Filming and the Department of Parks, Recreation and Marine. (District 3)

Or

Determine the proposed activity does not provide a sufficient overall public benefit and deny Special Event Permit Application #18-09664 of Justin Rudd dba the Community Action Team - California, a Domestic non-profit corporation, for the operation of the Haute Dog Howl’oween Parade in Marina Vista Park. (District 3)

agenda_items.name: 2017 Sept JCC
agenda_items.title: Authorize the Director of Parks, Recreation and Marine to execute a Memorandum of Understanding, and any related documents, with the Alpert Jewish Community Center located in Long Beach, to facilitate the identification and placement of senior volunteers through their Retired and Senior Volunteer Program, in Department of Parks, Recreation and Marine facilities, through June 30, 2018, with the option of one, three-year term extension through June 30, 2021 at the discretion of the Director. (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 2017 Sep Title V-Sr Com
agenda_items.title: Authorize the Director to execute all documents necessary to enter into the Title V-Senior Community Services Employment Program Host Agency Agreement with the County of Los Angeles Workforce Development, Aging, and Community Services for the continuation of the Senior Community Services Employment Program at the Department of Parks, Recreation and Marine, for a term of three years from October 1, 2017 through September 30, 2020.  (Department-wide)

agenda_items.name: 2017 Sept WCC
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to receive and file the Director's monthly highlights report, "We Create Community"  for September, 2017.
